document.full_text: british military advisers will find themselves overseeing a ragtag rebel force in libya that cannot even agree on who its top officer is, amid squabbling between two generals.
document.title: as british help libyan rebels, aid goes to a divided force
lines_and_colors: british military advisers will find themselves overseeing a ragtag rebel force in libya that cannot even agree on who its top officer is, amid squabbling between two generals.
